section.name: SOD's Properties
section.p: Sod has several parameters that can be set at run time in the xml config file. These are set in the properties element which is the first element in the sod element of sod's config file. Each property is set in a property element inside the properties element. These property elements each contain a name and value element.

subsection.name: Run Properties
